name: search-info-header.WorkflowRun
title: Workflow Run Information
body:
• Workflow Runs are runs of any particular Workflow.
  • Workflow Runs have input/output files associated with them, whereas Workflows do not.

name: search-info-header.Workflow
title: Workflow Information
body:
• Workflows define steps and their inputs & outputs. They are structurally similar to Common Workflow Language (CWL) definitions.
  • Workflow Runs are unique runs of each Workflow and have specific files associated with them.

name: search-info-header.FileSetMicroscopeQc
title: Basic Protocol
body:
This page contains the Microscope Optical QC recordings from 4DN labs. 4DN Imaging Group strongly advices this QC to be performed once a month, and uploaded to this page. To produce this data,

  1. Please use the TetraSpeckTM Fluorescent Microspheres from Thermo Fisher Scientific (catalog number T14792)
  2. Follow the simple step in this Protocol to produce a PSFj report.

name: announcements.4dn-perspective-published
title: The 4D Nucleome Perspective is Published
body: The 4D Nucleome Project perspective paper is online in Nature today. If you use any 4DN data, please cite this paper. A more extensive data release and use policy will be available soon.

name: announcements.reference-repliseq-data-released
title: Reference Repli-seq Data Released
body: Part of the goals of 4DN involves generating reference data sets for selected cell types to study how different experiment types complement each other in our understanding of nucleome dynamics. Today, 4DN released reference Repli-seq data for the selected Tiered cell lines.

name: announcements.first-4dn-experiments-released
title: First 4DN Experiments Released
body: The first 4DN Funded Hi-C experiments have been released to public on the portal.

name: announcements.ontology-utilization-updated
title: Ontology Utilization Updated
body: Ontology Terms from OBI, Uberon, and EFO are now represented on our database. Ontology terms can be internally used to describe cell lines and tissues. We will implement ontology utilization for other appropriate fields in the coming months.

name: announcements.data-submission-open-beta
title: Data Submission Open (Beta)
body: The 4DN Data Portal is open for beta-testers for data submission for Hi-C and related experiments.

name: error.login-failed.no_account
body:
There is no account registered with the provided email. Access is restricted to members of the 4DN consortium.
New Users: If you would like to get started submitting data, please see this Help section for creating an account.

name: item-page-headers.ExperimentSet.data-usage-guidelines
title: Public Data Usage Guidelines
body: **Data Use Guidelines:** This is a data set generated by the 4DN Network and made freely available to the scientific community. If you are intending to use these data for a publication, we ask that you please contact the data generating lab to discuss possible coordinated publication. In your manuscript, please cite the 4DN White Paper ([doi:10.1038/nature23884](https://doi.org/10.1038/nature23884)), and please acknowledge the 4DN lab which generated the data. Please direct any questions to the [Data Coordination and Integration Center](mailto:support@4dnucleome.org).
